website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality baby carrier that offers stretch, versatility, and sturdiness in a breathable fabric. Incredibly ergonomic
pros: This carrier is a top contender for carrying your baby
It stands out because of its design, which is aesthetic versus many of its contemporaries
cons: A few consumers felt that it was difficult to adjust, and some felt the sizing ran small

customer_reviews.title: So Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just came this morning and I already Love it!!! Got it on the first time trying and my 3 week old loves it! Bought it so I could comfortably carry our newborn at my husbands High School Reunion. So easy to use! Very stretchy. I have a large chest and am a plus size woman and it works well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria F.

customer_reviews.title: In love after the first hour!
customer_reviews.text: If this is your first time using a baby wrap, you will be confused and skeptical when you first put this on (as I was). However, I was madly in love with it within the hour! My 6 week old son has never slept so peacefully through the day than when he was in the wrap! It fits well, is made of really nice material (soft, stretchy, and sturdy), and comes with both paper and CD instructions! I'm already wondering how I made it thru 6 weeks without this glorious wrap! My husband wanted to try it right away when he got home and loved it as well! This is a great product and well worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love it! It's lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love it! It's lightweight and easy to use, but after using it once tore almost entirely down for no reason! Contacted customer service as it says lifetime warantee, but unsure if I would use it for safety reasons. Will stick to my secure Moby wrap. Update: company reimbursed full purchase price for defective item. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Talene Orlando

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to put it on properly (only took two tries, don't worry) and my daughter wasn't so insanely tiny, I fell in love. This sling is AMAZING. My daughter likes being in it, I like how convenient it makes everything when I've got to get stuff done around the house or in public and she just wants to be held.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: A life saver for my back!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling. It’s very easy to figure out after a few tries, and it holds my 18 month old son perfectly. He loves to run around in stores so he hasn’t really let me hold him in it throughout the store yet (which I’m hoping he will soon) but it helps tremendously when he’s having a tantrum. I wrap him up on me and sway and he’ll stop crying and just snuggle, it helps take the weight off my back too!
customer_reviews.author: UrMom

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: My arms and back have been killing me with my almost 20 lbs 5 month old. This takes a few lbs off of him and make it easy to walk around with him and do things. He loves to be held, it’s his happy place. Takes a little practice and patients at first. After a few uses it’s really easy and comfortable to use. The trick is to continually keep the fabric flat and neat as you wrap your self then it’s really easy to secure the baby to you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lemon Evers

customer_reviews.title: What a joke!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT as easy at they make it look plus if you are not super thin this will NOT work for you. The quality was very thin and would not trust it to hold even a stuffed animal. Very poor and don't recommend. ***UPDATE*** Received full refund but was also offered replacement of product. Customer service could be better and felt forced to update review from 1 star to at least 3 stars. I still feel the same about the product but at least the company did reach out to me and offered the refund. Ty
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Mabie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and my daughter loves it even though you still can't do a whole lot even when wearing it and the directions that come with is not much help to using it all the ways that you can I just looked up all the hold on YouTube the only bummer is that you can't use it to do a back hold it's all front and side holds ..even still it's really nice to have when you have a baby who like to be held a lot it frees your hands up some
customer_reviews.author: A.wekly

customer_reviews.title: Sweaty, thick and cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised I think. Is VERY WARM even during winter months because A) there’s 3 layers on your babies back B) you baby is smooshed against you and C) it’s thicker fabric than I expected. Very stretchy so you have to tie it tight so baby doesn’t end up sliding down. Have used many times and just don’t like it very much. Wanted to love it! I use my mesh Ergo and ring sling more because they’re not as sweaty and faster to take on and off. Would’ve returned but my cat managed to claw the heck out of it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Try this carrier, you'll love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier for my 2 mo. old grandchild and she loves it, she feels so cozy and safe. I babysit her and her 2 year old sister and the carrier keeps my hands free to do things around the house. My grandchild likes to face out so she can see everything, but you can also face younger babies towards you for security of the neck. The sling fits perfectly, it's nice and long to wrap around your body, it's also light and not hot. I recommend this product to everyone, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just save up and get a Moby...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until I got a Moby breathable bamboo wrap. Then I realized how hot this wrap is. Also the fabric is a bit too stretchy, so the baby sags or gets her circulation cut off because I have to tie it so tight... The nice thing is that they have excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: mchcthrn

customer_reviews.title: The one thing they don't tell you about this item ...
customer_reviews.text: The one thing they don't tell you about this item is that, it is not for everyone. It only works for smaller people. I'm a bigger women and I couldn't even get it to tie in the front. My husband even tried and it wouldn't tie for him either. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sling carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great sling carrier. The material used is durable and soft for the baby's skin. Instructions are very easy to follow, moms just need to tighten the wrap a bit more because the sling carrier is stretchable. After using it for a couple of minutes you will notice it loosen up. It is actually pretty long and I believe it can support extra size moms. This is very good for new born babies.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap! I have three and this is my favorite. It's soft and stretchy yet snug. Easy to get baby into and out of. Comes in a matching fabric bag with an instructional dvd as well as a small instructional guide. It seems tricky to put on at first but you'll be a pro baby wearer in no time. It gets warm so you may sweat in hot weather but it's great in warm and cooler weather. Very comfortable and you will love it! Hope you found this review helpful. Happy baby wearing!
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FABRIC!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT stretchy but comfy material for baby and mom!!! I had spent $190 on the ergo baby and hated it! Returned that and got this one and I absolutely love it! So comfortable and easy to wear. I only wear with my baby facing me tho, the other way squishes his stomach and makes him spit every time. He's also 2 months old so he's a bit flimsy in there, but with a nice tight tuck he stays out and always falls asleep in it!
customer_reviews.author: Lannes

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but difficult
customer_reviews.text: Its soft and comfortable but can get hot with the baby. My only real issue is that, even with the step by step instructions, I couldn't seem to ever master it. It would be perfect one time then I couldn't seem to do it quite right the next. It's just incredibly long and hard to do it alone. Could totally be just user error but it's not as easy as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! It is very thin and stretchy which is great, especially because I live in Florida where it gets very hot and humid. I have been using the wrap with my infant and it is very comfortable to carry her in. You can tighten and loosen it.
customer_reviews.author: Danigirle

customer_reviews.title: I was to hot lol
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and ive used it a couple handfuls of time, mostly when she was preemie , she was 5 lbs and this was perfect i could even use the bathroom with it on, but the hormones after having a baby are real lol, i was making my own waterpark wearing it, lol , it will start wearing it again if i start going out places, but now she just sits in her chair and i check on her while i do house work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Baby Sling with Thick Fabric
customer_reviews.text: Thick fabric, much thicker than expected. (Thicker than a Solly wrap) So I would only use this in cold weather or wear light layers. Other than that it works great and we love it! Came with instructions, a DVD, and a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: paul morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than mobi
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper and works the same. Same quality. My baby loves it
customer_reviews.author: smazur2

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product and I'm sure someone else will love it, it's just not for us. Very good quality, durable, stretchy, comfy soft cloth. We tried it for a good month and we get up and go so often that we find it a bit cumbersome even though we're pretty versed in how to wrap without looking at the paper anymore. We mostly just never find a good time to use it and still have it but usually end up using our snap on baby carrier more often. 4 out of 5 because it is a good product, it's just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kiri

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves being in it!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few days of using the wrap to get used to tying it right, and so that I felt confident about being hands free. For reference, my baby is 3 weeks old, and 7lbs, but I've been putting her in it since she was 2 weeks, and 6.5lbs. Cons: It's a little stretchier than I'd like it to be. Also, when Baby is screaming, it feels like it takes forever to put on. Pros: Baby loves being in it. Even if she's screaming, she will almost always settle down within about 5 minutes of being put in it. And then she usually falls asleep in it. Sometimes it seems almost magical.
customer_reviews.author: Kjill

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but lacks good support
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 3 stars bc it is comfortable. I bought this bc I left my other carrier at my parents on accident and needed something to carry my son. The baby seems to enjoy it-passes out instantly once he’s in. The material is pretty stretchy so I constantly have to readjust and the baby sags down after walking around. I prefer the “clip in” carriers to this kind, but it gets the job done. Seems to fit my body type okay-I’m 5’7” and 145#. I would like this more if it had head support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It has easy to follow instructions on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has easy to follow instructions on how to wear it. The fabric is soft jersey knit and stretchy, but not so stretchy your kid will fall out! I am a little disappointed that grey was the only color, but I am happy that the cost isn't high. It doesn't make me or the baby hot and is comfortable for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: cydney williams

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is sturdy but stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is sturdy but stretchy. I wear my 10 lb baby walking around at work and she tends to sag a bit low after about an hour, which then pulls on my shoulders. Also it's a bit too hot for summer days. But I like having her close to me. She nestles right in and falls asleep. I still use it. It would be nice if there were different sizes. I'm 160 lbs and this is a bit too long. It would be way too long for a slender and/or small breasted lady. On the other hand, it is too short for larger women.
customer_reviews.author: Malahala

customer_reviews.title: Considering my 2 month old doesn’t like to be anywhere except in our arms this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Considering my 2 month old doesn’t like to be anywhere except in our arms this thing is a life saver. Great quality and when cleaning is necessary just throw in the wash. Has a t shirt feel to it. Both me and my husband use it. This wrap is awesome! No need to spend an arm and a leg on an expensive one. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LeoJoeL

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how we survived before
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2. One for home and one to keep in the diaper bag. A lifesaver for fussy baby. If you not sure how we got anything done without them. Good quality, and good stretch for secure for. I there's a learning curve, but you catch on quickly
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm big and was worried this wouldn't work for me, but there are lovely YouTube tutorials out there that show how to wrap it for plus size ladies! Even with the plus size wrapping style, I only had a few inches of slack to spare so I don't recomend this if you're bigger than about 240lbs or 2-3xl.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Hoilman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bestie. She was so excited and loves to use it because she can finally get things done around the house. She was worried that baby would slip out the bottum but once she out it on she said it was very secure and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Too much work-not for me
customer_reviews.text: We live in Sacramento, CA and get hot summers! The material is too thick and not breathable at all. Aside from that, we need a carrier for when we are on the go and doing errands. The wrap is wayyyyyy to long-even longer because I'm only 5'2. Such an inconvenience to wrap myself around this, than put her in. The fabric is also a little too stretchy. My 2 month old did not feel secure in this at all. I ended up buying the baby k'tan active and me and baby love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, would buy again. Helps baby to nap.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, exactly as I expected. The wrap is soft and my baby falls asleep in it very easily. This is hugely helpful for getting him to nap. I think this is a great purchase for the price. It is a little complicated as are all wraps in this style. You have to consider the time of year you are putting a baby in it, he gets very warm and a sweaty in it in 75 degree weather. Glad it is starting to cool down so I can use this to calm him more often.
customer_reviews.author: Turtlebeak

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 3 week old.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wrap to use with my newborn and it works really well. It is just as good as the ones you get for 40$. It is very breathable soft cloth. It is thin enough to not be too heavy but thick enough to give the baby a lot of support. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: I found this product way to unwieldy to use. ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this product way to unwieldy to use. It is about 35 yards of a jersey-cotton fabric. That's it. It takes forever t get wrapped and is awkward getting the baby in or out.
customer_reviews.author: kristian

customer_reviews.title: this wrap is easy to put on and easy to carry baby in
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day! Can’t get enough of it! My daughter loves it as well, fabric is soft and comfy! I live in south Texas so it gets warm even in winter, this wrap is easy to put on and easy to carry baby in. It was a life saver when it comes to going into the grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: HWTX

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and I'm a real person
customer_reviews.text: Is almost the same as moby wraps I have had before. The fabric is different but works just the same! I'm plus size 16.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Turtles

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this at first. I felt like something like this could drop my baby and not safe. After trying it out at home , I love it. So easy!! Honestly this is a great deal. You don't need a more expensive one , this one is great and for the price = awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyofboys

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy directions and my one month old has fallen asleep on me twice already within 5 minutes of getting him in the wrap.It's then very simple to undo the wrap and put him down without waking him up. It's perfect for the times when he's tired and fussy but not ready for another feeding. I also love feeling close to him while he's in it. It's very supportive and I already feel confident going hands free with him in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison G Allen

customer_reviews.title: ... kind of wrap but I thought this one was great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't ever used any other kind of wrap but I thought this one was great for the price. My 7 pound baby likes to be carried in it. I imagine it might get a little hot to wear in the summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Thick material
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. My newborn wasn't very impressed but the 10 minutes she let me carry her around was pretty cool. Wish I would've bought one with my first child. Material is thicker than I expected but no complaints since it is winter time. Think stretchy hoodie type thickness. I was worried that it wouldn't fit around me, I'm on the larger side, but it fits great. I love the color and fabric type. I'm excited to get to use it on errands. Thinking about buying a second one for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This made carrying around my newborn so easy! It’s comfortable to wear and allows you to be so close to your little one and still get stuff done!
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Five Shooting Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!!! I use this ALL of the time: cleaning the house with him, shopping, doctors' appointments, everything!!! I just tie myself up and pop him in; so quick and easy. Just have to be careful when leaning forward and he occasionally needs my arm or hand for extra head support when he's asleep but it's the best purchase for a baby who loves to be held and cuddled when a mommy still has work to do!
customer_reviews.author: desano12

customer_reviews.title: The material is comfortable for my baby to rest his face against
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple device, but that doesn't mean it isn't made in a quality manner. The material is comfortable for my baby to rest his face against, and it is heavy duty enough to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JonSam

customer_reviews.title: Decent carrier
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to tie and use. Fabric is very soft and cozy for baby. Does get a little hot wearing baby, not super breathable. Comfortable for mom and baby
customer_reviews.author: Ramon G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. I was weary to use it at first. But this was so amazing and secure. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: lover of stuff

customer_reviews.title: Best new mom purchase!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wrap! I have two traditional baby carries that work fine but this wrap is so much better because it is so lightweight and breathable and perfect for newborns. My son is 3 weeks old and he loves being in this wrap. And the best part is I can nurse him while he’s in it! This wrap has made life as a new mom so much easier. I highly recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: O. Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Good wrap for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this wrap. It holds baby close and soothes him to sleep. It's very easy to use and its good for the price. This is the wrap I use at home. I use a little more expensive wrap when I take baby out.
customer_reviews.author: CDA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I Have A Clingy Baby And I Am Always Trying To Do And Move Stuff. Now It’s A Win Win.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Ransome

customer_reviews.title: Soft, works,but right if your chunkier
customer_reviews.text: Soft Cotton, easy to wrap and wear but if you’re any bigger than the model pictured it doesn’t go on the exact same and honestly isn’t as comfortable as I assumed it would fit better
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these before and my baby really liked it. The material seems think enough and it's breathable. Hopefully this time it'll be a good fit for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Image Production

customer_reviews.title: Soft material and comes with detailed instructions
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a friend, makes the perfect baby shower gift. Comes in a nice box, was delivered on time. Material is soft and the box comes with a DVD explaining how to wrap it which is very nice. I think it's a must have for every new expecting parents
customer_reviews.author: Arnab

customer_reviews.title: It can be used for infants and older children.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I provide childcare for a couple of children and having this has been life changing. It took a few tries to learn how to use it in a variety of ways but it's become a staple for my child care.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Chapman

customer_reviews.title: She hated it.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it on yet (6 mo pregnant) but my husband did and he put our 2 year old in it. She hated it... but she's two. lol. Seems like a nice soft, breathable fabric. Right amount of stretch and long enough. I can't wait to try it out this summer when baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely in love with this wrap
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely in love with this wrap! Guess being a first time mom I overly got excited and bought the boba wrap which is more expensive than this but really there's not much difference between them two. Actually I use this more often than the boba
customer_reviews.author: Oceans

customer_reviews.title: Not just for human babies!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Bought it so my 25 lb aging dog can come hunt for a Christmas tree in 2 feet of snow with the whole fam! He's gonna keep me warm at the same time, works great!
customer_reviews.author: rachel severinsen

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier. Do not waste your money on the more expensive brands. Not only do I like this one better it's less expensive. It's a stretchier material so it takes a little working with, but it's also a lighter material so it's more breathable. My daughter absolutely loves being carried around in this and I love that it grows with them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: Too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: It was nice for a little while, but because the material is so stretchy, it doesn’t hold the baby in good for long. Baby will start sagging and you will keep having to readjust the wrap. I tried to tie the wrap tighter, but then it is just uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice material so I’ll give that 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice material so I’ll give that 3 stars. But too short material for baby to grow in and my hubby to wear (works on Petite women though). My baby hates this type of sling though so better hope yours likes being tight and snug.
customer_reviews.author: HMBHonesty

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite. Instructions aren't clear.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been able to use this one time. I don't understand the instructions on wrapping it that well. More specifically, I'm not sure at what step I'm supposed to place the baby inside. I've tried it multiple times, but I never felt like my baby was secure in it. I used it one time around the house, but not for longer than 10 minutes before going back to my woven wrap.
customer_reviews.author: V. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this sling
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this sling! Its so comfy for me and my baby girl. I've been using it since she was a couple weeks old and she still goes to sleep within a few short minutes of being placed inside. She's almost 4 months old now! This is a must have for busy moms and dads. It's also very easy to tie - not intimidating at all! Great quality, very nice packaging, unbeatable price... if you are in the market for a sling, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t fit at all, and I have normal ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit at all, and I have normal sizes, even after pregnancy I recovered my weight very fast. You have to be veeeery thin to fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier, but
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit warm for summer, even in the moderate southern California coastal climate. My little one is not a fan, but I think she'll like it once the temperatures drop. The wrap is a perfect fit. The tails are a bit long, but I assume that is due to the one size fits all nature of the product.
customer_reviews.author: KDKEsq

customer_reviews.title: My sling tore right away!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Since writing this review Innoo Tech has agreed to send a replacement sling to me. I updated my review from 1 star to 3 for their excellent customer service and prompt reply. I bought this item not even two weeks ago and already discovered a huge tear in it. I ended up sewing the fabric back together as I needed to use the sling, but I'm very disappointed with the quality of this item as a result!
customer_reviews.author: Bee Zee

customer_reviews.title: Ergo Adapt is a better carrier
customer_reviews.text: Way too stretchy. Way too long. Much too difficult to use. Went with an ergo adapt instead--much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have to readjust/tighten it after a few minutes for my big man (around 16-17lbs). Seems like I can get the shoulder straps tight enough but the the initial starting point, where the tag is, loosens up. Definitely better than the other carrier I have. I just wish there was a way to keep him cool while carrying him. He's already a little furnace, combined with 90°+ heat he sweats like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat product, but I found it difficult to get the baby in and out without assistance. I prefer a carrier/backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but annoying to wrap fifty times ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but annoying to wrap fifty times esp in a parking lot where the fabric touches the nasty pavement where food drink gum etc has been id get the one that is same fabric but don’t have to wrap
customer_reviews.author: Mb32

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. Her baby is tiny. We managed it on the first try, although it could have been wrapped tighter. She'll figure out the adjustment and it appears versatile enough to last for him to grow a lot more. He seemed happy with it. Hopefully I can update later, as I just gave it to her last night.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until the third time useing it my 7 lb grandbaby poked his head right through it. It had ripped right down the middle. I would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase of this product. We have tried multiple types of baby carriers over the course of years (ridged back carrier, Maya sling and a home made type of sling). All resulted in back pain and somewhat limited mobility for my wife. This is the first time that she can (worry free) lugg our little bundle of joy around with her. The fabric is very comfortable and supports even a newborns head when properly tucked in. A great buy that makes trips with multiple little children and dog a brezze.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: So difficult to put on and I never felt like baby was secure in it. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Once it gets put on right it works fine and the baby feels secure enough
customer_reviews.text: We got this wrap because it was cheaper than some other brands out there. It's very long, stretchy, and hard to put on alone (avoid using it in public). Once it gets put on right it works fine and the baby feels secure enough, but may need to be re-tightened. There might be a better wrap out there that's simpler with less material.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to adjust to right tightness but once ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to adjust to right tightness but once you figure it out it's fabulous. A lifesaver for use with twins! Don't follow wrap instructions give no, go to YouTube and search for wrapping twins. Given results much safer and easier. Material us very stretchy, must get tight wrap to be safe and secure with babies.
customer_reviews.author: Twothings

customer_reviews.title: Really like.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. More comfortable for you and baby then the other baby carriers .
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Velzaquez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this! No back aches, sore shoulders, or neck aches. Used it several times over the summer to hike with my heavy baby. Even on a 2 hour pretty tough hike, I was still comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as more pricy wraps
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is soft, comfortable, and works well! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LONG! Probably 14 feet! It is very soft and just a little stretchy. Not as complicated as some people make it out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Badfish311

customer_reviews.title: Stretchable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using wrap since 2004 This one is affordable and great But not very soft But my little boy likes it
customer_reviews.author: don't get this app

customer_reviews.title: It has good stretch and the fabric feels like a soft sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this carrier!! It has good stretch and the fabric feels like a soft sweatshirt. I've been using it since baby girl was 5 weeks old and she loves it. She sleeps for hours in it. Best use is traveling through an airport with an infant. She slept the whole flight, and i didnt have to take her out through security.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Still use it with my six month old, forward facing. I had to watch several youtube videos. The only thing is that it gets pretty hot! If I'm wearing it at home, I just skip the shirt. It covers enough I can still answer the door and go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Rad_Rex

customer_reviews.title: Handsfree
customer_reviews.text: Material is a little hot for the summer months, but it is great. I watched youtube videos to learn how to actually use it. It is pretty awesome. You need a little time to get it situated, but it is worth it. My baby loves sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Rodriguez-Landry

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wrap (especially for the price) for a newborn in a warmer climate. I have the Ergo 360 and the infant insert was like a snow suit sleeping bag - way too warm to wear in the house or during the summer. This simple wrap is great. I did deduct a star because it's sort of a chore to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie, NY

customer_reviews.title: This has been perfect for my newborn
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my newborn! It's very easy to tie on and I can easily slip her in. When tied correctly she stays very snug to my body and I don't ever worry about her falling out. The fabric is good quality and thicker to hold the baby up. It gets very hot when I have her strapped on for too long, but that's what I get for living in Texas!
customer_reviews.author: Cambric McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Thick, sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: I will wait to use in the fall. Fairly thick material.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft the material is! Def works well for my infant.
customer_reviews.author: MaMaMar

customer_reviews.title: Nice baby sling but definitely takes a bit of practice
customer_reviews.text: Nice baby sling but definitely takes a bit of practice to get the wrap the right way and tightness but worth it. Plus I like how easy it to take along with you anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Nachos

customer_reviews.title: I like it. My daughter does
customer_reviews.text: I like it. My daughter does, too. Its easy to have her fall asleep in and simply untie it, unwrap it and lay her down for a nap. No undoing buckles and lifting her out. She always woke up for those types if carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this enough! It is fantastic once you get the hang of it and half the price of the Boba. My son loves it! It is a bit of a thicker fabric so probably better for cooler weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like baby slides down and I can’t geg it tight ...
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is almost too stretchy. I feel like baby slides down and I can’t geg it tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Kangaroo pouch!
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to at first but it’s easy to learn. I looked at YouTube videos on how to wrap baby and she loves it. Let’s me get things done while keeping baby close to me!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sure if that would be better.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my newborn when he was colicky. It was a lifesaver! It did stretch out too quickly. I've never used a moby, so I'm not. Sure if that would be better.
customer_reviews.author: CasLA

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected it
customer_reviews.text: it was not what i expect... i didn't use it i actually gave it away
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved for babiest first few months- helped him feel safe and secure
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you have a sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap and so does my daughter. The fabric is breathable and comfortable for both of us and it's very easy to use. My only complaint is that it began tearing after a month of consistent use. Thankfully, I own a sewing machine and am able to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and snug for baby
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear and snug for baby. I was skeptical about purchasing as it’s so much cheaper than the popular brands, but I am extremely satisfied with its performance!
customer_reviews.author: ktz

customer_reviews.title: Best wrap! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I probably have at least 15 different wraps and this is by far my absolute fav. I even have the moby and I prefer this one over the moby. The fabric is so soft and keeps the baby warm without getting sweaty. Definitely would suggest to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M Meirose

customer_reviews.title: Soft but hard to control
customer_reviews.text: It is ok, a Little loose, hard to fix. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jush Owen

customer_reviews.title: My baby loved it as a newborn
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved it as a newborn. She fell asleep in it within minutes every time. She's 16lbs now and we still use it with her face forward but after 45 minutes it'll start sagging. Perfect for quick grocery trips but not for long events.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to snuggle your baby safely & be able ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to snuggle your baby safely & be able to still work and do the things around the house. I bought this for my daughter who just had a baby. She has 2 carriers and she says it is her favorite! She highly recommends it and is telling her pregnant sister that it is a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: C Allen

customer_reviews.title: Newborns
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for newborns and small babies. It snuggled my daughter up against me while I worked. She never likes to be put down so this was very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Snug
customer_reviews.text: Feels snug on both the parent and the baby. My daughter was born 6lb so she was too small for the baby carrier for quite some time. Any time she went in this, she was happy very soon after. You can also breastfeed in this which is great, no one would know.
customer_reviews.author: nia

product_meta.title: Innoo Tech Baby Sling Carrier Natural Cotton Nursing Baby Wrap Suitable for Newborns to 35 lbs Breastfeeding Sling Baby Holder Soft Safe and Comfortable Nice Baby Shower Gift Gray
feature_bullets: ♥Be Hands Free- With the baby sling, you have free use of both of your hands. You can wash dishes, go for walks, go shopping or walk your dog while quieting a restless baby. Both mommy and baby are happy!
Keep your baby safe and pleasant-The baby sling is 4.5 meters long,0.54 meters wide meaning it can provides excellent support for your baby’s head, neck,back and gives pleasant ride for the baby.
♥Reduces Crying: When the baby is wrapped in a sling, its muscles relax and crying will not come easily. With relaxed muscles, it's much easier for the baby to fall asleep.
♥Convenient Breastfeeding: With the baby near your chest, breastfeeding can be both convenient and private.

♥Enhance the Bond with Baby-Babies all love being close to mommy! Stay close to mom's heart, a baby can hear your beating heart and feel the warmth from your body in the sling where he can feel peace of mind.

♥Keep You Comfortable-Say goodbye to shoulder and back strain. The sling surrounds you and your baby’s spine, making it easy to counteract the baby’s weight with your back. You will no longer get tired or get any sore muscles.

♥100% Rock Solid, Money Back Guarantee-We believe in all of our products and this baby wrap is no exception. We think you're going to love it, but if you don't feel that this product is for you, let us know and we will refund every cent of your purchase or send you a new replacement free.

specifications.Safety warning: Please use extra caution when carrying babies younger than 4 month old in a sling or wrap.
